form.label: Metrics Accelerator - API Manager and Analytics - Sandbox

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | stats values(businessGroup) as bg by businessGroup

panel.title: API Analytics - Sandbox - Transactions/Requests - Last 30 days

single.title: API Analytics - Sandbox - Transactions/Requests - Last 30 days

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.transactions) as total | stats sum(total) as "API Requests"

panel.title: API Analytics - Sandbox - Transactions/Requests - Last 30 days - Timeline

chart.title: API Analytics - Sandbox - Transactions/Requests - Last 30 days - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.transactions > 0 | chart values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.transactions) as "API Requests" by _time, businessGroup

panel.title: API Manager - Sandbox - APIs - Current Count

single.title: API Manager - Sandbox - APIs - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.total) as total | stats sum(total) as "API Manager - Total APIs"

panel.title: API Manager - Sandbox - APIs by Status - Current

chart.title: API Manager - Sandbox - APIs by Status - Current

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.active) as active, values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.inactive) as inactive | stats max(active) as "Active APIs", max(inactive) as "Inactive APIs" | transpose

panel.title: API Manager - Sandbox - APIs by Status - Timeline

chart.title: API Manager - Sandbox - APIs by Status - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.active) as "Active APIs", values(apiManagerMetrics.apis.sandbox.inactive) as "Inactive APIs" by _time, businessGroup
